Paddy before!

Hello my name is Erin and I have a dog called paddy he is a springer spaniel and he is lovely. I would like to get out more with paddy and give him more exesise.But beacause it is dark eraly.I got paddy when i just moved in to my house I was about three!

paddy is 9 years old .He is brown and white . Paddy loves his food and every thing he eats.He loves chewing slippers and socks
